hero.title: Get Unstuck. Start Small. Amaize Yourself.

hero.imageAlt: Clean interface with a focus timer and productivity questions

features.title: Why Amaize?
features.description: Designed to help you focus when you're stuck, Amaize turns your intent into momentum—fast.

items.title: One Question at a Time
items.description: Answer lightweight prompts to get clear on what matters—without overwhelm.

items.title: Guided Focus Timers
items.description: Pick 5, 15, or 30 minutes and get to work with visual cues and pause/resume control.

items.title: Momentum Tracking
items.description: Summarizes your thoughts and tracks your focus time, helping you notice patterns and progress.

items.title: Zero Configuration
items.description: No accounts, no setup, no pressure—just load the page and begin.

items.title: Keyboard-First Navigation
items.description: Fly through the app with Enter and Tab, skipping friction and building flow.

items.title: Respectful AI Support
items.description: Only shows up when you need it. Encouraging, not pushy. Helpful, not hype.

cta.title: Try Amaize Now
cta.description: It only takes one small action to turn the day around. Amaize helps you start.
